mapper.select: select * from ums_permission t order by t.id desc

SELECT DISTINCT t.id id, t.per_name perName, t.per_url perUrl, t.per_type perType, t.icon icon, t.status status, t.remark remark, t.parent_id parentId FROM ums_permission t WHERE t.parent_id = #{parentId} order by t.id

SELECT p.id id, p.parent_id parentId, p.icon icon, p.per_name title, p.per_type perType, p.per_url href, p.remark remark, p.status status FROM ums_permission p LEFT JOIN ums_role_per rp ON rp.per_id = p.id LEFT JOIN ums_role ro ON ro.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN ums_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = ro.id LEFT JOIN ums_user uu on ur.user_id=uu.id WHERE ro.status = 1 and uu.user_account = #{userAccount} and p.status = 1 order by p.per_sort asc,p.id asc

SELECT p.per_url button FROM ums_permission p LEFT JOIN ums_role_per rp ON rp.per_id = p.id LEFT JOIN ums_role ro ON ro.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN ums_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = ro.id LEFT JOIN ums_user uu on ur.user_id=uu.id WHERE ro.status = 1 and uu.user_account = #{userAccount} and p.status = 1 and p.per_type = 1 order by p.per_sort asc,p.id asc
